Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the lantibiotics family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The first modified amino acid was found to be a dehydrobutyrine (Dhb) at position 8 that could form a beta-methyl-lanthionine bond with Cys13. A second beta-methyl-lanthionine formation between Dhb and Cys was found at positions 10 and 32, respectively. A disulfide bridge was between the two Cys residues at positions 21 and 29. The data is in accordance with the sequence analysis of bovicin HJ50 and thermophilin 1277.
Sequence Information.Comments: The inhibitory peptide differs from the Streptococcus pyogenes-produced SA-FF22 in the absence of lysine in position 2.

Literature.Title: Salivaricin G32, a Homolog of the Prototype Streptococcus pyogenes Nisin-Like Lantibiotic SA-FF22, Produced by the Commensal Species Streptococcus salivarius.
Literature.Author: Wescombe PA, Dyet KH, Dierksen KP, Power DA, Jack RW, Burton JP, Inglis MA, Wescombe AL, Tagg JR.

Literature.Title: Macedovicin, the second food-grade lantibiotic produced by Streptococcus macedonicus ACA-DC 198.
Literature.Author: Georgalaki M, Papadimitriou K, Anastasiou R, Pot B, Van Driessche G, Devreese B, Tsakalidou E.
